description:
The Tufa Sweater is a warm and comfortable crewneck sweatshirt that is designed for climbing sessions in mind.

  • It is made of 100% certified organic cotton yarns that respect the environment and offer comfort and breathability
  • It has invisible zips on the sides that allow you to access your harness and belay device with ease, while the cuff and hem details offer a fresh take on the classic cotton sweater
  • The sweater has a regular fit that follows the shape of your body but leaves some room for movement
name: La Sportiva Tufa Sweater - Women's
